	region Venice_Province

settlement
{
	level city
	region Beleb_el_Anab_Province; Trieste, Giulia Province

	year_founded 0
	population 5200
	plan_set default_set
	faction_creator venice
	building
	{
		type core_building stone_wall
	}
	building
	{
		type barracks city_watch
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_roads roads
	}
	building
	{
		type port port
	}
	building
	{
		type temple_catholic church
	}
